name: part_009
file: tmp_AZKi - 【3D LIVE】SPECiAL LiVE -NON FiCTiON- 【youtube music weekend】 [NDYaVPFVtzk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: AZKi talks about the theme of her live performance and her desire to continue growing with her fans.
Instrumental intro for the song 'in this world'.
AZKi performs the song 'in this world'.

subtitles.original: お話しした通りなんですけど...
subtitles.english: As I mentioned...

subtitles.original:
えっと、今日はこのスペシャルライブ
NON FiCTiONということで...
subtitles.english:
Um, today is this special live,
"NON FiCTiON"...

subtitles.original:
ノンフィクションなこの世界で、えー、
変化し続けることを大切にしていきたいし...
subtitles.english:
In this non-fiction world, I want to
value continuing to change...

subtitles.original:
こういうね、非日常のこういうライブ、
あ、もちろん...
subtitles.english: This kind of extraordinary live show, and of course...

subtitles.original:
ま、普段やっているAZKiんちの日常の配信でも、
どんどん変化していけるようになりたいと思います！
subtitles.english:
even in my usual daily streams at "AZKi-nchi",
I want to be able to keep changing more and more!

subtitles.original:
えー、開拓者のみんなと一緒に
足跡を残していきたいと思っています！
subtitles.english:
I want to continue leaving footprints
together with all you Pioneers!

subtitles.original: だからこれからも一緒に歩いていこうね！
subtitles.english: So let's keep walking together from now on, okay?

subtitles.original: それでは聞いてください。in this world。
subtitles.english: Now, please listen. "in this world."

subtitles.original: 綻ぶ言葉を見失ってる
subtitles.english: I'm losing sight of the words that bloom

subtitles.original: 空が涙を降らせていたんだ
subtitles.english: The sky was letting tears fall

subtitles.original: 誰のために 何のために
subtitles.english: For whom? For what purpose?

subtitles.original: これが運命だと言うの？
subtitles.english: Is this what you call destiny?

subtitles.original: 嘘が街を包み込んでいる
subtitles.english: Lies are enveloping the city

subtitles.original: 鳥が飛べずに声を上げていた
subtitles.english: The birds, unable to fly, were raising their voices

subtitles.original: たった一つの存在を灯す
subtitles.english: Lighting up a single existence

subtitles.original: この場所で君を待ってる
subtitles.english: I'm waiting for you in this place

subtitles.original: 世界はとても苦しそうでした
subtitles.english: The world seemed very painful

subtitles.original: 私に何ができるというの？
subtitles.english: What can I possibly do?

subtitles.original: 歌うことが正しいかなんて
subtitles.english: Whether singing is the right thing to do...

subtitles.original: 確かなのは君がいたから
subtitles.english: What's certain is that because you were here

subtitles.original: 私はここにいるの
subtitles.english: I am here

subtitles.original: 何回何十回だって
subtitles.english: No matter how many times

subtitles.original: 君と出会うから
subtitles.english: Because I'll meet you

subtitles.original: 夜が明けていく光が降り注ぎ
subtitles.english: The night breaks into dawn, light pouring down

subtitles.original: 喜び悲しみを抱え前を向く
subtitles.english: Embracing joy and sorrow, looking forward

subtitles.original: 君と生きてくここでこの場所で
subtitles.english: I'll live with you here, in this place

subtitles.original: それが私の世界だ
subtitles.english: That is my world

subtitles.original: その一秒一瞬が煌めく yeah
subtitles.english: Every second, every moment shines, yeah

subtitles.original: 過去が道を壊したとしても
subtitles.english: Even if the past destroyed the path

subtitles.original: 夢が街を食らい尽くそうとしても
subtitles.english: Even if dreams are about to devour the city

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だからそばにいるよ
subtitles.english: It's okay, because I'm by your side

subtitles.original: 君に笑ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: I want you to smile

subtitles.original: 生まれた意味を探しているの
subtitles.english: I'm searching for the meaning of being born

subtitles.original: 転んでもただ走り続けていく
subtitles.english: Even if I fall, I'll just keep on running

subtitles.original: 今を信じて明日を描いた
subtitles.english: Believing in the now, I drew tomorrow

subtitles.original: 心が叫びたがってる
subtitles.english: My heart wants to shout

subtitles.original:
タイムマシンに乗ってさ
別の未来を選ぶことが出来たなら
subtitles.english:
If I could have taken a time machine
and chosen a different future

subtitles.original:
君のいない世界を創造する？
そんな世界は想像できない
subtitles.english:
Would I create a world without you?
I can't imagine such a world.

subtitles.original:
君に届きますように
この声がこの歌が
subtitles.english: May it reach you, this voice, this song

subtitles.original: 何回何十回だって君を選ぶから
subtitles.english: Because no matter how many times, I'll choose you

subtitles.original: 夜が滲んでいく地平の彼方へ
subtitles.english: The night blurs toward the horizon

subtitles.original: 響く呼吸の音を確かに感じた
subtitles.english: I clearly felt the sound of breathing echoing

subtitles.original: 始めよう君とこの未来を
subtitles.english: Let's begin, this future with you

subtitles.original: 繋いだ手を離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let go of our joined hands

subtitles.original: 大きな声で名前を呼んで
subtitles.english: Call my name with a loud voice

subtitles.original: 奇跡を駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Running through miracles

subtitles.original: どこまでも行けるよ
subtitles.english: We can go anywhere

subtitles.original: ここからもう一度 君と私で始めよう
subtitles.english: Let's start once more from here, you and me

subtitles.original: 無限の中に生まれた物語を 君と歩いていく
subtitles.english:
Walking with you through the story
born in infinity

subtitles.original: この世界が悲しみに溢れたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if this world is overflowing with sadness

subtitles.original: 私は歌を歌い続けていく
subtitles.english: I will continue to sing my song

subtitles.original: 君と生きてくここでこの場所で
subtitles.english: I'll live with you here, in this place

subtitles.original: それが私の世界だ
subtitles.english: That is my world

subtitles.original: その一秒一瞬が煌めく yeah
subtitles.english: Every second, every moment shines, yeah

subtitles.original: 傷つき涙を流す君が 幸せだと思える世界へ
subtitles.english:
To a world where you, hurt and crying,
can feel happy
